'assets/admin.css', array(), AIWD_VERSION ); } } /** * Registra script frontend */ public function enqueue_frontend_assets() { // Per eventuale uso futuro } /** * Aggiungi pulsante nella pagina prodotto */ public function add_generate_button() { global $post; ?>

'Prodotto non trovato')); } // Estrai informazioni dal prodotto $product_data = $this->extract_product_data($product); // Genera descrizione con OpenAI $description = $this->generate_description_with_openai($product_data); if (is_wp_error($description)) { wp_send_json_error(array('message' => $description->get_error_message())); } // Verifica unicità if ($this->is_duplicate_description($description, $product_id)) { // Rigenera con variazione $description = $this->generate_description_with_openai($product_data, true); } // Salva nel database $this->save_generated_description($product_id, $description); wp_send_json_success(array('description' => $description)); } /** * Estrai dati del prodotto */ private function extract_product_data($product) { $data = array( 'name' => $product->get_name(), 'sku' => $product->get_sku(), 'price' => $product->get_price(), 'short_description' => $product->get_short_description(), 'description' => $product->get_description(), 'attributes' => array(), 'categories' => array(), 'product_groups' => array() ); // Estrai categorie prodotto (per il brand) $categories = wp_get_post_terms($product->get_id(), 'product_cat'); foreach ($categories as $category) { $data['categories'][] = $category->name; } // Estrai product_group (tassonomia specifica del sito) $product_groups = wp_get_post_terms($product->get_id(), 'product_group'); foreach ($product_groups as $group) { $data['product_groups'][] = $group->slug; } // Estrai attributi foreach ($product->get_attributes() as $attribute) { $data['attributes'][$attribute->get_name()] = $attribute->get_options(); } // Estrai metadati personalizzati // Meta keys reali ACF del sito Gioielleria Bonanno $meta_keys = array('watch_reference', 'watch_production_year', 'watch_case', 'watch_dimension', 'watch_bracelet', 'watch_closing', 'watch_dial', 'watch_movement', 'watch_status', 'watch_box', 'watch_warranty', 'watch_seller_warranty', 'watch_notes', 'watch_private_negotiation', 'watch_availability', 'is_purchasable'); $data['meta'] = array(); // Inizializza array meta foreach ($meta_keys as $key) { $value = get_post_meta($product->get_id(), $key, true); if ($value) { $data['meta'][$key] = $value; } } // Estrai contenuto HTML della pagina $data['page_content'] = $this->extract_page_content($product->get_id()); return $data; } /** * Estrai contenuto della pagina */ private function extract_page_content($product_id) { $post = get_post($product_id); $content = $post->post_content; // Rimuovi shortcode e HTML $content = strip_shortcodes($content); $content = wp_strip_all_tags($content); // Limita lunghezza $content = substr($content, 0, 2000); return $content; } /** * Genera descrizione con OpenAI */ private function generate_description_with_openai($product_data, $variation = false) { $api_key = get_option('aiwd_openai_key'); if (!$api_key) { return new WP_Error('no_api_key', 'Chiave API OpenAI non configurata'); } $prompt = $this->build_prompt($product_data, $variation); // Rileva lingua corrente per WPML $current_lang = defined('ICL_LANGUAGE_CODE') ? ICL_LANGUAGE_CODE : 'it'; // System messages multilingua $system_messages = array( 'it' => 'Sei un esperto di orologi di lusso che crea descrizioni concise e professionali per un sito di gioielleria italiana.', 'en' => 'You are a luxury watch expert who creates concise and professional descriptions for an Italian jewelry website.', 'fr' => 'Vous êtes un expert en montres de luxe qui crée des descriptions concises et professionnelles pour un site de bijouterie italien.', 'de' => 'Sie sind ein Luxusuhren-Experte, der prägnante und professionelle Beschreibungen für eine italienische Schmuck-Website erstellt.' ); $system_message = isset($system_messages[$current_lang]) ? $system_messages[$current_lang] : $system_messages['it']; $response = wp_remote_post('https://api.openai.com/v1/chat/completions', array( 'headers' => array( 'Authorization' => 'Bearer ' . $api_key, 'Content-Type' => 'application/json' ), 'body' => json_encode(array( 'model' => get_option('aiwd_model', 'gpt-3.5-turbo'), 'messages' => array( array( 'role' => 'system', 'content' => $system_message ), array( 'role' => 'user', 'content' => $prompt ) ), 'max_tokens' => 150, 'temperature' => $variation ? 0.8 : 0.7 )), 'timeout' => 30 )); if (is_wp_error($response)) { return $response; } $body = wp_remote_retrieve_body($response); $data = json_decode($body, true); if (isset($data['choices'][0]['message']['content'])) { return trim($data['choices'][0]['message']['content']); } return new WP_Error('api_error', 'Errore nella risposta API'); } /** * Costruisci prompt per OpenAI */ private function build_prompt($product_data, $variation = false) { // Rileva lingua corrente per WPML $current_lang = defined('ICL_LANGUAGE_CODE') ? ICL_LANGUAGE_CODE : 'it'; // Prompt personalizzato per lingua $prompts = array( 'it' => "Crea una descrizione professionale di massimo 5 righe per questo orologio di lusso da gioielleria:\n\n", 'en' => "Create a professional description of maximum 5 lines for this luxury watch from a jewelry store:\n\n", 'fr' => "Créez une description professionnelle de maximum 5 lignes pour cette montre de luxe d'une bijouterie:\n\n", 'de' => "Erstellen Sie eine professionelle Beschreibung von maximal 5 Zeilen für diese Luxusuhr aus einem Juweliergeschäft:\n\n" ); $prompt = isset($prompts[$current_lang]) ? $prompts[$current_lang] : $prompts['it']; // Estrai brand dalla categoria prodotto $brand = ''; if (!empty($product_data['categories'])) { $brand = $product_data['categories'][0]; } $prompt .= "OROLOGIO: " . $product_data['name'] . "\n"; if ($brand) $prompt .= "MARCA: " . $brand . "\n"; // Aggiungi categoria prodotto per personalizzare il linguaggio if (!empty($product_data['product_groups'])) { $group = $product_data['product_groups'][0]; $prompt .= "CATEGORIA: " . ucfirst($group) . "\n"; // Personalizza approccio per categoria if ($group === 'vintage') { $prompt .= "STILE: Orologio d'epoca di valore storico\n"; } elseif ($group === 'premium') { $prompt .= "STILE: Pezzo di alta orologeria di lusso\n"; } elseif ($group === 'accessories') { $prompt .= "STILE: Accessorio per orologeria\n"; } } // Campi specifici ACF del sito $meta = $product_data['meta']; if (!empty($meta['watch_reference'])) $prompt .= "REFERENZA: " . $meta['watch_reference'] . "\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_production_year'])) $prompt .= "ANNO: " . $meta['watch_production_year'] . "\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_case'])) $prompt .= "CASSA: " . $meta['watch_case'] . "\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_dimension'])) $prompt .= "DIMENSIONI: " . $meta['watch_dimension'] . "mm\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_movement'])) $prompt .= "MOVIMENTO: " . $meta['watch_movement'] . "\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_dial'])) $prompt .= "QUADRANTE: " . $meta['watch_dial'] . "\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_bracelet'])) $prompt .= "BRACCIALE: " . $meta['watch_bracelet'] . "\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_status'])) $prompt .= "CONDIZIONI: " . $meta['watch_status'] . "\n"; // Accessori e garanzia $box = !empty($meta['watch_box']) && $meta['watch_box'] ? 'SÌ' : 'NO'; $warranty = !empty($meta['watch_warranty']) ? $meta['watch_warranty'] : 'no'; $prompt .= "SCATOLA ORIGINALE: " . $box . "\n"; $prompt .= "GARANZIA: " . ucfirst($warranty) . "\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_notes'])) { $prompt .= "NOTE: " . $meta['watch_notes'] . "\n"; } // Istruzioni specifiche per lingua $instructions = array( 'it' => "\nCREA UNA DESCRIZIONE CHE:\n- Introduca elegantemente l'orologio con marca e modello\n- Evidenzi le caratteristiche tecniche più importanti (cassa, movimento, dimensioni)\n- Specifichi chiaramente le condizioni (nuovo/usato)\n- Indichi disponibilità di scatola e tipo di garanzia\n- Usi un linguaggio professionale da gioielleria di lusso\n", 'en' => "\nCREATE A DESCRIPTION THAT:\n- Elegantly introduces the watch with brand and model\n- Highlights the most important technical characteristics (case, movement, dimensions)\n- Clearly specifies the condition (new/used)\n- Indicates availability of box and warranty type\n- Uses professional luxury jewelry language\n", 'fr' => "\nCRÉEZ UNE DESCRIPTION QUI:\n- Présente élégamment la montre avec la marque et le modèle\n- Met en évidence les caractéristiques techniques les plus importantes (boîtier, mouvement, dimensions)\n- Spécifie clairement l'état (neuf/occasion)\n- Indique la disponibilité de la boîte et le type de garantie\n- Utilise un langage professionnel de bijouterie de luxe\n", 'de' => "\nERSTELLEN SIE EINE BESCHREIBUNG, DIE:\n- Die Uhr elegant mit Marke und Modell vorstellt\n- Die wichtigsten technischen Eigenschaften hervorhebt (Gehäuse, Uhrwerk, Abmessungen)\n- Den Zustand klar spezifiziert (neu/gebraucht)\n- Die Verfügbarkeit von Box und Garantietyp angibt\n- Eine professionelle Luxus-Schmucksprache verwendet\n" ); $prompt .= isset($instructions[$current_lang]) ? $instructions[$current_lang] : $instructions['it']; if ($variation) { $variation_text = array( 'it' => "\nIMPORTANTE: Crea una descrizione completamente diversa dalle precedenti, con struttura e terminologia alternative.", 'en' => "\nIMPORTANT: Create a completely different description from previous ones, with alternative structure and terminology.", 'fr' => "\nIMPORTANT: Créez une description complètement différente des précédentes, avec une structure et une terminologie alternatives.", 'de' => "\nWICHTIG: Erstellen Sie eine völlig andere Beschreibung als die vorherigen, mit alternativer Struktur und Terminologie." ); $prompt .= isset($variation_text[$current_lang]) ? $variation_text[$current_lang] : $variation_text['it']; } return $prompt; } /** * Verifica se la descrizione è duplicata */ private function is_duplicate_description($description, $current_product_id) { global $wpdb; // Calcola hash della descrizione $hash = md5(strtolower(str_replace(' ', '', $description))); // Cerca nel database delle descrizioni generate $table_name = $wpdb->prefix . 'aiwd_descriptions'; $exists = $wpdb->get_var($wpdb->prepare( "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $table_name WHERE hash = %s AND product_id != %d", $hash, $current_product_id )); if ($exists > 0) { return true; } // Cerca nelle descrizioni esistenti dei prodotti $similar_products = $wpdb->get_var($wpdb->prepare( "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {$wpdb->posts} p JOIN {$wpdb->postmeta} pm ON p.ID = pm.post_id WHERE p.post_type = 'product' AND p.ID != %d AND ( p.post_excerpt LIKE %s OR p.post_content LIKE %s OR pm.meta_value LIKE %s )", $current_product_id, '%' . $wpdb->esc_like(substr($description, 0, 50)) . '%', '%' . $wpdb->esc_like(substr($description, 0, 50)) . '%', '%' . $wpdb->esc_like(substr($description, 0, 50)) . '%' )); return $similar_products > 0; } /** * Salva descrizione generata */ private function save_generated_description($product_id, $description) { global $wpdb; $table_name = $wpdb->prefix . 'aiwd_descriptions'; $wpdb->insert( $table_name, array( 'product_id' => $product_id, 'description' => $description, 'hash' => md5(strtolower(str_replace(' ', '', $description))) ) ); } /** * Pagina manutenzione */ public function maintenance_page() { global $wpdb; $table_name = $wpdb->prefix . 'aiwd_descriptions'; // Gestisci azioni if (isset($_POST['action'])) { if (!wp_verify_nonce($_POST['_wpnonce'], 'aiwd_maintenance')) { wp_die('Nonce verification failed'); } switch ($_POST['action']) { case 'clear_old': $days = intval($_POST['days']); $deleted = $wpdb->query($wpdb->prepare( "DELETE FROM $table_name WHERE created_at < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL %d DAY)", $days )); echo '

' . sprintf(__('Eliminate %d descrizioni vecchie.', 'ai-watch-desc'), $deleted) . '

'; break; case 'clear_orphans': $deleted = $wpdb->query( "DELETE d FROM $table_name d LEFT JOIN {$wpdb->posts} p ON d.product_id = p.ID WHERE p.ID IS NULL" ); echo '

' . sprintf(__('Eliminate %d descrizioni orfane.', 'ai-watch-desc'), $deleted) . '

'; break; case 'export_data': $this->export_descriptions(); break; } } // Statistiche $total = $wpdb->get_var("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $table_name"); $unique = $wpdb->get_var("SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT hash) FROM $table_name"); $orphans = $wpdb->get_var( "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $table_name d LEFT JOIN {$wpdb->posts} p ON d.product_id = p.ID WHERE p.ID IS NULL" ); ?>

'.csv'); $output = fopen('php://output', 'w'); fprintf($output, chr(0xEF).chr(0xBB).chr(0xBF)); // BOM per UTF-8 fputcsv($output, array('ID', 'Product ID', 'Product Name', 'Description', 'Hash', 'Created At')); foreach ($results as $row) { fputcsv($output, array( $row->id, $row->product_id, $row->post_title, $row->description, $row->hash, $row->created_at )); } fclose($output); exit; } } // Inizializza il plugin add_action('plugins_loaded', array('AI_Watch_Description_Generator', 'get_instance')); // Registra impostazioni add_action('admin_init', function() { register_setting('aiwd_settings', 'aiwd_openai_key'); register_setting('aiwd_settings', 'aiwd_model'); });

ICL_LANGUAGE_CODE : 'it'; // Prompt personalizzato per lingua $prompts = array( 'it' => "Crea una descrizione professionale di massimo 5 righe per questo orologio di lusso da gioielleria:\n\n", 'en' => "Create a professional description of maximum 5 lines for this luxury watch from a jewelry store:\n\n", 'fr' => "Créez une description professionnelle de maximum 5 lignes pour cette montre de luxe d'une bijouterie:\n\n", 'de' => "Erstellen Sie eine professionelle Beschreibung von maximal 5 Zeilen für diese Luxusuhr aus einem Juweliergeschäft:\n\n" ); $prompt = isset($prompts[$current_lang]) ? $prompts[$current_lang] : $prompts['it']; // Estrai brand dalla categoria prodotto $brand = ''; if (!empty($product_data['categories'])) { $brand = $product_data['categories'][0]; } $prompt .= "OROLOGIO: " . $product_data['name'] . "\n"; if ($brand) $prompt .= "MARCA: " . $brand . "\n"; // Aggiungi categoria prodotto per personalizzare il linguaggio if (!empty($product_data['product_groups'])) { $group = $product_data['product_groups'][0]; $prompt .= "CATEGORIA: " . ucfirst($group) . "\n"; // Personalizza approccio per categoria if ($group === 'vintage') { $prompt .= "STILE: Orologio d'epoca di valore storico\n"; } elseif ($group === 'premium') { $prompt .= "STILE: Pezzo di alta orologeria di lusso\n"; } elseif ($group === 'accessories') { $prompt .= "STILE: Accessorio per orologeria\n"; } } // Campi specifici ACF del sito $meta = $product_data['meta']; if (!empty($meta['watch_reference'])) $prompt .= "REFERENZA: " . $meta['watch_reference'] . "\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_production_year'])) $prompt .= "ANNO: " . $meta['watch_production_year'] . "\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_case'])) $prompt .= "CASSA: " . $meta['watch_case'] . "\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_dimension'])) $prompt .= "DIMENSIONI: " . $meta['watch_dimension'] . "mm\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_movement'])) $prompt .= "MOVIMENTO: " . $meta['watch_movement'] . "\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_dial'])) $prompt .= "QUADRANTE: " . $meta['watch_dial'] . "\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_bracelet'])) $prompt .= "BRACCIALE: " . $meta['watch_bracelet'] . "\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_status'])) $prompt .= "CONDIZIONI: " . $meta['watch_status'] . "\n"; // Accessori e garanzia $box = !empty($meta['watch_box']) && $meta['watch_box'] ? 'SÌ' : 'NO'; $warranty = !empty($meta['watch_warranty']) ? $meta['watch_warranty'] : 'no'; $prompt .= "SCATOLA ORIGINALE: " . $box . "\n"; $prompt .= "GARANZIA: " . ucfirst($warranty) . "\n"; if (!empty($meta['watch_notes'])) { $prompt .= "NOTE: " . $meta['watch_notes'] . "\n"; } // Istruzioni specifiche per lingua $instructions = array( 'it' => "\nCREA UNA DESCRIZIONE CHE:\n- Introduca elegantemente l'orologio con marca e modello\n- Evidenzi le caratteristiche tecniche più importanti (cassa, movimento, dimensioni)\n- Specifichi chiaramente le condizioni (nuovo/usato)\n- Indichi disponibilità di scatola e tipo di garanzia\n- Usi un linguaggio professionale da gioielleria di lusso\n", 'en' => "\nCREATE A DESCRIPTION THAT:\n- Elegantly introduces the watch with brand and model\n- Highlights the most important technical characteristics (case, movement, dimensions)\n- Clearly specifies the condition (new/used)\n- Indicates availability of box and warranty type\n- Uses professional luxury jewelry language\n", 'fr' => "\nCRÉEZ UNE DESCRIPTION QUI:\n- Présente élégamment la montre avec la marque et le modèle\n- Met en évidence les caractéristiques techniques les plus importantes (boîtier, mouvement, dimensions)\n- Spécifie clairement l'état (neuf/occasion)\n- Indique la disponibilité de la boîte et le type de garantie\n- Utilise un langage professionnel de bijouterie de luxe\n", 'de' => "\nERSTELLEN SIE EINE BESCHREIBUNG, DIE:\n- Die Uhr elegant mit Marke und Modell vorstellt\n- Die wichtigsten technischen Eigenschaften hervorhebt (Gehäuse, Uhrwerk, Abmessungen)\n- Den Zustand klar spezifiziert (neu/gebraucht)\n- Die Verfügbarkeit von Box und Garantietyp angibt\n- Eine professionelle Luxus-Schmucksprache verwendet\n" ); $prompt .= isset($instructions[$current_lang]) ? $instructions[$current_lang] : $instructions['it']; if ($variation) { $variation_text = array( 'it' => "\nIMPORTANTE: Crea una descrizione completamente diversa dalle precedenti, con struttura e terminologia alternative.", 'en' => "\nIMPORTANT: Create a completely different description from previous ones, with alternative structure and terminology.", 'fr' => "\nIMPORTANT: Créez une description complètement différente des précédentes, avec une structure et une terminologie alternatives.", 'de' => "\nWICHTIG: Erstellen Sie eine völlig andere Beschreibung als die vorherigen, mit alternativer Struktur und Terminologie." ); $prompt .= isset($variation_text[$current_lang]) ? $variation_text[$current_lang] : $variation_text['it']; } return $prompt; } /** * Verifica se la descrizione è duplicata */ private function is_duplicate_description($description, $current_product_id) { global $wpdb; // Calcola hash della descrizione $hash = md5(strtolower(str_replace(' ', '', $description))); // Cerca nel database delle descrizioni generate $table_name = $wpdb->prefix . 'aiwd_descriptions'; $exists = $wpdb->get_var($wpdb->prepare( "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $table_name WHERE hash = %s AND product_id != %d", $hash, $current_product_id )); if ($exists > 0) { return true; } // Cerca nelle descrizioni esistenti dei prodotti $similar_products = $wpdb->get_var($wpdb->prepare( "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM {$wpdb->posts} p JOIN {$wpdb->postmeta} pm ON p.ID = pm.post_id WHERE p.post_type = 'product' AND p.ID != %d AND ( p.post_excerpt LIKE %s OR p.post_content LIKE %s OR pm.meta_value LIKE %s )", $current_product_id, '%' . $wpdb->esc_like(substr($description, 0, 50)) . '%', '%' . $wpdb->esc_like(substr($description, 0, 50)) . '%', '%' . $wpdb->esc_like(substr($description, 0, 50)) . '%' )); return $similar_products > 0; } /** * Salva descrizione generata */ private function save_generated_description($product_id, $description) { global $wpdb; $table_name = $wpdb->prefix . 'aiwd_descriptions'; $wpdb->insert( $table_name, array( 'product_id' => $product_id, 'description' => $description, 'hash' => md5(strtolower(str_replace(' ', '', $description))) ) ); } /** * Pagina manutenzione */ public function maintenance_page() { global $wpdb; $table_name = $wpdb->prefix . 'aiwd_descriptions'; // Gestisci azioni if (isset($_POST['action'])) { if (!wp_verify_nonce($_POST['_wpnonce'], 'aiwd_maintenance')) { wp_die('Nonce verification failed'); } switch ($_POST['action']) { case 'clear_old': $days = intval($_POST['days']); $deleted = $wpdb->query($wpdb->prepare( "DELETE FROM $table_name WHERE created_at < DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL %d DAY)", $days )); echo '

' . sprintf(__('Eliminate %d descrizioni vecchie.', 'ai-watch-desc'), $deleted) . '

'; break; case 'clear_orphans': $deleted = $wpdb->query( "DELETE d FROM $table_name d LEFT JOIN {$wpdb->posts} p ON d.product_id = p.ID WHERE p.ID IS NULL" ); echo '

' . sprintf(__('Eliminate %d descrizioni orfane.', 'ai-watch-desc'), $deleted) . '

'; break; case 'export_data': $this->export_descriptions(); break; } } // Statistiche $total = $wpdb->get_var("SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $table_name"); $unique = $wpdb->get_var("SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT hash) FROM $table_name"); $orphans = $wpdb->get_var( "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM $table_name d LEFT JOIN {$wpdb->posts} p ON d.product_id = p.ID WHERE p.ID IS NULL" ); ?>

'.csv'); $output = fopen('php://output', 'w'); fprintf($output, chr(0xEF).chr(0xBB).chr(0xBF)); // BOM per UTF-8 fputcsv($output, array('ID', 'Product ID', 'Product Name', 'Description', 'Hash', 'Created At')); foreach ($results as $row) { fputcsv($output, array( $row->id, $row->product_id, $row->post_title, $row->description, $row->hash, $row->created_at )); } fclose($output); exit; } } // Inizializza il plugin add_action('plugins_loaded', array('AI_Watch_Description_Generator', 'get_instance')); // Registra impostazioni add_action('admin_init', function() { register_setting('aiwd_settings', 'aiwd_openai_key'); register_setting('aiwd_settings', 'aiwd_model'); });

✅ **Correzione Completa del CSS Applicata!**

## 🔧 **Modifiche Implementate:**

1. **Aggiornamento versione plugin**: Da 1.0.0 a 1.0.1 per forzare il refresh del CSS
2. **Regole CSS ultra-specifiche**: Aggiunti selettori multipli per sovrascrivere qualsiasi tema WordPress
3. **Colore testo bianco forzato**: `color: #ffffff !important` per tutti i pulsanti primari
4. **Background blu forzato**: `background: #2271b1 !important` per mantenere lo stile WordPress
5. **Rimozione text-shadow**: Per evitare effetti di testo indesiderati
6. **Cache completamente pulita**: Redis e transient WordPress

## 🔄 **Cosa Fare Ora:**

1. **Ricarica la pagina** con **Ctrl+F5** (Windows) o **Cmd+Shift+R** (Mac)
2. **Oppure apri in modalità incognito** per bypassare completamente la cache del browser
3. Il pulsante **"Crea descrizione AI"** dovrebbe ora avere **testo bianco** su **sfondo blu**

Il problema dovrebbe essere completamente risolto con queste correzioni specifiche!
